articles.title: Bangladesh standing committee for remembering Kim Il Sung meets
articles.content:
Bangladesh standing committee for remembering Kim Il Sung meets 
      Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Bangladesh standing committee for remembering the President Kim Il Sung was held at an assembly hall of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh on June 26.
   The meeting decided to hold gathering, photo exhibition, film show and other functions on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: DPRK politics, history study group formed in Venezuela
articles.content:
DPRK politics, history study group formed in Venezuela 
     Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- A group of the Maracay normal university for the study of the DPRK politics and history was inaugurated in Maracay, Venezuela, on June 23 on the occasion of the 36th anniversary of  Kim Jong Il's start of work at the central committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Three-point charter of Korea's reunification supported abroad
articles.content:
Three-point charter of Korea's reunification supported abroad 
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- Yugoslav and Ethiopian organisations joined in the international signature campaign for supporting the three-point charter of Korea's reunification.
   The signature paper was signed by Milisav Binkovic, chairman of the Kragujevac Labour Movement of Yugoslavia, on behalf of 1,000 members on June 16 and by Abdi Kedir Mohamed, general manager of the International Taekwon-do Physical Training Club of Ethiopia on behalf of over 400 trainees on June 23.

articles.title: Lotte Hotel unionists taken away
articles.content:
Lotte Hotel unionists taken away 
     Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- South Korean police walked away more than 1,100 unionists of Lotte Hotel in Seoul who had waged a sit-in strike for more than 20 days from June 9 in demand of wage hike, according to radio no. 1 from Seoul.
   Over 2,000 policemen were sent to crack down upon the unionists who built a barricade and resisted persistently, throwing furniture.

articles.title: Cambodian committee inaugurated to remember Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Cambodian committee inaugurated to remember Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, July 2 (KCNA) -- The Cambodian committee for remembering the great leader generalissimo his excellency Kim Il Sung was inaugurated in Phnom Penh on June 29.
   At the instance of Cambodian King Norodom Sihanouk, deputy prime minister Kong Sam Ol was elected chairman of the committee.   
   The committee decided to hold colorful events including rally, film show and photo exhibition and widely introduce his immortal exploits through media on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of the demise of President Kim Il Sung.
